ModMetaData.name: Project RimFactory Revived - Autopsy Machine
ModMetaData.author: GeodesicDragon
ModMetaData.description: ABOUT Adds a machine which can perform autopsies. It works quicker than a human doctor and never needs to take a break; not only that, it will even butcher the corpse when it has finished. CREDITS PRF Team: For their mod and the preview image background Smuffle and dna: For Harvest Organs Post Mortem JuryOfYourFears: Autopsy machine texture
